references.paper_title: Phi-3 Technical Report: A Highly Capable Language Model Locally on Your Phone
references.reason: This paper introduces Phi-3, a vision-language model used in one of the main methods evaluated in the research.

references.paper_title: Qwen-VL: A Versatile Vision-Language Model for Understanding, Localization, Text Reading, and Beyond
references.reason: This paper introduces Qwen-VL, another vision-language model that is compared against in the experiments.

references.paper_title: PaliGemma: A versatile 3B VLM for transfer
references.reason: This paper introduces PaliGemma, a vision-language model which is used as a key component in one of the benchmark models.

references.paper_title: Dense Passage Retrieval for Open-Domain Question Answering
references.reason: This paper introduces a key dense passage retrieval technique that is used as a baseline for comparison in the experiments.

references.paper_title: ColBERT: Efficient and Effective Passage Search via Contextualized Late Interaction over BERT
references.reason: This paper introduces ColBERT, a widely-used efficient passage search method that is used as a baseline for comparison in the experiments.
